Action.author: devin-fisher
Action.body: The decision was to push this. At least its work will not be part of INDY-205. Once INDY-205 is complete we can reconsider this work.

Action.author: spivachuk
Action.body: The current implementation still requires a node nym to be a cryptonym. So the issue is actual.

Action.author: esplinr
Action.body: It would be nice to have nodes identified with DIDs instead of with legacy Cryptonyms, but it doesn't provide any functionality that isn't already present. So we will not be prioritizing this work in the near future.
